pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, May 17, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

Private meetings

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador Andrew Furey will visit a local child care facility and hold a brief media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the official welcome ceremony for Their Royal Highnesses The Prince of Wales and The Duchess of Cornwall.

Confederation Building
100 Prince Philip Drive

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
